page.title: 08CLUBS & SOCIETIES
page.content: For such a small population there are a large number of clubs & societies. Of the people surveyed 47% belonged to at least one of these clubs & societies. In total there are 23 of these clubs & societies based in Bomere Heath. The list below gives some idea of the range :- {Tennis Club { Over 60's Club { Amateur Dramatics Society { Brownies & Guides { Ladies Club { Womens Institute { Bowling Club } They cater for nearly all age groups although there does seem to be a lack of clubs specifically designed for teenagers.
